description: World Kitchen is the supplier of unique
overview: World Kitchen UK markets most popular and trusted house ware brands such as corelle, corningware simply lite and visions glass saucepans. The company offers best cookware and dinnerware materials for kitchen to showcase your pride to family members and friends.World Kitchen is the supplier of unique brands such as Corelle Chip & Break Resistant Dinnerware, CorningWare & Visions Glass Cookware and the all new Corningware Simply Lite Glass Bakeware. The Corelle range consists of Dinner sets and also loose Dinner Plates, Bowls & Dishes for a complete Tableware setting. CorningWare and Visions Glass Cookware has a wide range of Saucepans, Casseroles and Skillet that equals that of Stainless Steel, Hard Anodized and Iron Cookware. CorningWare Simply Lite is the newest of our ranges offering wide range of shapes, sizes and sets of Light Weight Glass Bakeware.
